thread.title: Seahawks S Thomas: Lack of preparation made him play 'timid'
thread.title_full: Seahawks S Thomas: Lack of preparation made him play 'timid'

author: Stunning details in Lamar Odom brothel incident
title: Seahawks S Thomas: Lack of preparation made him play 'timid'
text:
Seahawks S Thomas: Lack of preparation made him play 'timid' FOXSports 5 hrs ago © Getty Images EAST RUTHERFORD, NJ - FEBRUARY 02: Free safety Earl Thomas #29 of the Seattle Seahawks gestures during the second quarter Super Bowl XLVIII at MetLife Stadium on February 2, 2014 in East Rutherford, New Jersey. (Photo by Tom Pennington/Getty Images) Seattle Seahawks safety Earl Thomas said he played tentatively in last week's loss at Cincinnati because he wasn't ready to play.
AdChoices Earl Thomas with startling admission of CIN loss: "I was playing timid because I wasn't fully prepared" #Seahawks @thenewstribune
— Gregg Bell (@gbellseattle) October 15, 2015 "I didn't give our defense a chance because I was playing a little timid because I wasn't fully prepared," the four-time Pro Bowl selection told reporters per the Seattle Post-Intelligencer .
When quizzed by the media as to why he wasn't prepared, Thomas didn't have an answer. "I don't know," he said.
Thomas recorded two tackles and an interception in the contest against the Bengals, who rallied from a 17-point deficit in the fourth quarter before prevailing in overtime. He added that preparation affects his entire approach to the game.
"I feel like when you're prepared you're fully confident," Thomas said. "You can challenge everything. You're your best and you can really trust what you're doing out there."
